entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:56 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
